member.name: M:FluentValidation.DefaultValidatorExtensions.Must``2(FluentValidation.IRuleBuilder{``0,``1},System.Func{``0,``1,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Defines a predicate validator on the current rule builder using a lambda expression to specify the predicate. Validation will fail if the specified lambda returns false. A lambda expression specifying the predicate

member.summary: Checks if the current chain is the child of another chain. For example, if chain1 were for "Parent.Child" and chain2 were for "Parent.Child.GrandChild" then chain2.IsChildChainOf(chain1) would be true.
member.returns: True if the current chain is the child of the other chain, otherwise false

member.name: P:FluentValidation.Resources.Messages.email_error
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{PropertyName}' is not a valid email address..

member.name: P:FluentValidation.Resources.Messages.equal_error
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{PropertyName}' should be equal to '{PropertyValue}'..

member.name: P:FluentValidation.Resources.Messages.exact_length_error
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{PropertyName}' must be {MaxLength} characters in length. You entered {TotalLength} characters..

member.name: P:FluentValidation.Resources.Messages.exclusivebetween_error
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{PropertyName}' must be between {From} and {To} (exclusive). You entered {Value}..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{PropertyName}' must be greater than '{ComparisonValue}'..

member.name: P:FluentValidation.Resources.Messages.greaterthanorequal_error
